translation.en: People remember Sam Cooke as a pristine Frank Sinatra wannabe.
translation.it: La gente pensa a Sam Cooke come al perfetto emulatore di Frank Sinatra.

translation.en: But in reality, he was a complicated black man in a complicated world.
translation.it: Ma in realtà era un nero complicato in un mondo complicato.

translation.en: Record companies really did not want a black man
translation.it: Le case discografiche non volevano un nero che parlasse dei problemi del Paese.

translation.en: talking about issues that were going on in the country.
translation.it: un nero che parlasse dei problemi del Paese.

translation.en: They wanted him to be an entertainer and nothing more,
translation.it: Volevano che intrattenesse e basta,

translation.en: and that was never gonna be enough for Sam Cooke.
translation.it: e questo a Sam Cooke non bastava.

translation.en: ♪ How many deaths will it take ♪
translation.it: Quanta gente deve morire?

translation.en: ♪Till you know ♪ ♪ Too many people have died ? ♪
translation.it: Prima che tu capisca che ne sono morti troppi...

translation.en: In the times where everything was so oppressive,
translation.it: All'epoca dell'oppressione,

translation.en: he broke through a lot of color barriers and wasn't afraid to be the first.
translation.it: superò molti ostacoli legati al colore e non ebbe paura di essere il primo.

translation.en: Empowerment--this is what drove him to talk with Malcolm X and Muhammad Ali.
translation.it: Emancipazione: ecco cosa lo portò a parlare con Malcolm X e Muhammad Ali.

translation.en: He was so unafraid.
translation.it: Non aveva paura.

translation.en: If you afraid, you couldn't be hangin' out with Malcolm, but...
translation.it: Se avevi paura e uscivi con Malcolm,

translation.en: the FBI might find a way to get rid of you.
translation.it: l'FBI trovava il modo di farti sparire.

translation.en: These were the early stages of black power.
translation.it: Il potere nero era ancora all'inizio.

translation.en: That black male energy that Sam Cooke possessed,
translation.it: L'energia che Sam Cooke possedeva in quanto nero,

translation.en: unfortunately, for some people in power in this country,
translation.it: sfortunatamente, per alcuni potenti del Paese

translation.en: represented a threat that had to be stopped.
translation.it: rappresentava una minaccia e andava fermato.

translation.en: This very mysterious death was just the most improbable death for Sam Cooke.
translation.it: La sua morte è davvero misteriosa. Era improbabile per uno come lui.

translation.en: What happened? Why was he there? And who was this woman he was with?
translation.it: Ciò che è successo, il perché fosse lì, chi era la donna con lui,

translation.en: And why'd he get shot? All those become bigger questions
translation.it: perché gli hanno sparato... Sono tutte domande più importanti

translation.en: than "What was he on the edge of achieving?"
translation.it: di "Cosa stava per raggiungere?"

translation.en: It's a double murder.
translation.it: È un doppio omicidio.

translation.en: It's the murder of the physical being who was Sam Cooke,
translation.it: È stato ucciso sia l'uomo Sam Cooke,

translation.en: but there's also the murder of his legacy.
translation.it: È stato ucciso sia l'uomo Sam Cooke, che la sua eredità.

translation.en: One of the biggest shocks I ever had in my life.
translation.it: È stato uno dei traumi più grandi della mia vita.

translation.en: I was on the expressway in Detroit, and the radio was on.
translation.it: Ero in autostrada a Detroit... ...con la radio accesa.

translation.en: Soul singer Sam Cooke shot to death last night...
translation.it: E diceva che Sam Cooke... ...era stato ucciso la notte prima.

translation.en: in Compton or wherever he was.
translation.it: A Compton o ovunque fosse.

translation.en: I was devastated.
translation.it: Ero distrutto.

translation.en: I don't think I functioned for a week.
translation.it: Sarò stato bloccato per una settimana.

translation.en: It was horrible.
translation.it: È stato orribile.

translation.en: I asked my father
translation.it: Quando mio padre mi ha detto che era morto

translation.en: when he told me he was dead, I said, "What, a car accident?
translation.it: Quando mio padre mi ha detto che era morto gli ho detto "Un incidente d'auto?

translation.en: A plane crash?"
translation.it: Un incidente aereo?"

translation.en: I couldn't-- Even when he told me he got shot, I...
translation.it: Non riuscivo a credere che gli avessero sparato.

translation.en: I could've just passed out.
translation.it: Stavo per svenire.

translation.en: Who would want to shoot Sam Cooke? That's what I asked myself.
translation.it: Chi sparerebbe a Sam Cooke? Ecco che mi sono chiesto.

translation.en: I was sad and confused back then,
translation.it: Ero triste e confuso all'epoca

translation.en: and most-- other people, especially in the black community, but not only,
translation.it: come tanti altri, soprattutto nella comunità nera, ma non solo.

translation.en: were sad and confused. You know, "What happened?"
translation.it: Si chiedevano tutti: "Che è successo?"

translation.en: Everybody was cold but anxiously waiting.
translation.it: Avevano tutti freddo, ma attendevano con ansia.

translation.en: They wanted to see Sam Cooke.
translation.it: Volevano vedere Sam Cooke.

translation.en: They wanted to know if this really happened.
translation.it: Volevano sapere se era successo davvero.

translation.en: There was just disbelief and sorrow all mixed up.
translation.it: Erano incredulità e dolore mischiati.

translation.en: Two hundred thousand people-plus showed up at his funeral in Chicago,
translation.it: Più di duecentomila persone si sono presentate al funerale a Chicago,

translation.en: and this is how this man died,
translation.it: e quest'uomo è morto così.

translation.en: you know, naked at a seedy hotel in Los Angeles.
translation.it: Nudo in uno squallido hotel di Los Angeles.

translation.en: He's one of the biggest pop stars in America,
translation.it: Era uno degli artisti pop più famosi in America,

translation.en: and he's just mysteriously dead now. Didn't make any sense.
translation.it: e ora è morto misteriosamente. Non ha alcun senso.

translation.en: Muhammad Ali, in his grief and rage, essentially said,
translation.it: Muhammad Ali, nel suo dolore e nella sua rabbia disse

translation.en: "If this had happened to Frank Sinatra or The Beatles or Ricky Nelson,
translation.it: "Se fosse successo a Frank Sinatra o ai Beatles o a Ricky Nelson,

translation.en: the FBI would be investigating this."
translation.it: l'FBI starebbe indagando."

translation.en: 'Cause, of course, it felt this all went way too quickly.
translation.it: Perché, ovviamente, la cosa era sfumata in fretta.

translation.en: And Muhammad Ali, I think, spoke for the entire community
translation.it: E penso che Muhammad Ali abbia parlato a nome della comunità

translation.en: who believed that this was being treated as just another dead black person.
translation.it: che credeva che fosse il solito trattamento riservato ai neri.

translation.en: Sam Cooke, at the time of his death,
translation.it: Sam Cooke, quando è morto,

translation.en: is someone who has significant meaning to the black community.
translation.it: era una persona importante per la comunità nera.

translation.en: Black community loves him.
translation.it: Lo adoravano.

translation.en: Sam Cooke didn't mean the same to white America.
translation.it: Sam Cooke non era lo stesso per gli americani bianchi.

translation.en: They didn't recognize how important Sam Cooke was.
translation.it: Loro non capivano quanto fosse importante.

translation.en: Sam Cooke's death, or at least the way that it's been treated in the media,
translation.it: La morte di Sam Cooke, o almeno com'è stata gestita dai media,

translation.en: it's been allowed to sort of hijack the rest of his career.
translation.it: ha permesso il dirottamento del resto della sua carriera.

translation.en: People didn't think of Sam Cooke in that way,
translation.it: La gente non lo vedeva così, ma Sam Cooke

translation.en: but he's a racial hero as much as he was a musical hero.
translation.it: era un eroe per la razza tanto quanto lo era per la musica.

translation.en: Between the way he died and this representation of him
translation.it: Tra la sua morte e la sua rappresentazione come un personaggio unidimensionale

translation.en: as a sort of almost one-dimensional character
translation.it: e la sua rappresentazione come un personaggio unidimensionale

translation.en: kind of loses the essence of who he was.
translation.it: si è persa l'essenza di chi era veramente.

translation.en: You have to question
translation.it: Bisogna chiedersi,

translation.en: why did the record companies suppress his politics?
translation.it: perché le case discografiche soffocarono le sue idee?

translation.en: Let's do a little capsule version of the Sam Cooke story.
translation.it: Raccontiamo la vita di Sam Cooke in breve.

translation.en: -How'd it all happen... -The captions version. Uh...
translation.it: - Com'è... - In breve...

translation.en: Born. My father was a minister.
translation.it: Mio padre era un pastore...

translation.en: Uh, I started singing in the church, naturally, because I'm exposed to, uh, gospel singing first, Mike.
translation.it: Ho iniziato a cantare in chiesa grazie all'influsso del gospel.

translation.en: Sam Cooke is born in 1931 in Mississippi.
translation.it: Sam Cooke nacque nel 1931 in Mississippi.

translation.en: As Sam Cooke was coming of age during the Great Depression, late '30s into the '40s,
translation.it: Crebbe durante la Grande Depressione, fine anni '30 inizio '40,

translation.en: slavery was something that was still a residual memory for many people.
translation.it: quando la schiavitù era ancora impressa nella memoria di molti.

translation.en: You're talking about a time where black people,
translation.it: Parliamo di un'epoca in cui la comunità nera, soprattutto gli uomini, veniva linciata continuamente.

translation.en: especially black men, were being lynched all over the place.
translation.it: la comunità nera, soprattutto gli uomini, veniva linciata continuamente.

translation.en: I'm certain that people like Sam Cooke's family,
translation.it: Sono sicuro che gente come la famiglia di Sam, compreso suo padre

translation.en: including his father, who was a preacher, said, "We've got to get somewhere
translation.it: Sono sicuro che gente come la famiglia di Sam, compreso suo padre che era un pastore, dicessero: "Dobbiamo andare

translation.en: where we can have a life for ourselves, where we can actually not just survive, but hopefully, we can win."
translation.it: dove possiamo vivere per conto nostro e non sopravvivere, e magari vincere."

translation.en: My great-grandmother was a slave in Mississippi.
translation.it: La mia bisnonna era schiava in Mississippi.

translation.en: She had no education. Neither did my father.
translation.it: Non era istruita, e neanche mio padre.

translation.en: He was a self-made man,
translation.it: Era partito dal nulla,

translation.en: but he saw the disadvantages to the negro child in the South,
translation.it: ma vedeva quanto fosse brutta la vita dei bambini neri al Sud,

translation.en: so he went north to Chicago.
translation.it: quindi si trasferì a Chicago.

translation.en: In many ways, I'm very like my father.
translation.it: Per molti versi, sono come mio padre.

translation.en: He has this intense drive that I've got.
translation.it: Abbiamo la stessa energia.

translation.en: Papa Cook got a church in Chicago,
translation.it: Papa Cook ottenne una chiesa a Chicago,

translation.en: so everybody went to church in his family.
translation.it: e tutta la sua famiglia andava in chiesa.

translation.en: Bronzeville was a beautiful place.
translation.it: Bronzeville era un posto fantastico.

translation.en: In that corridor, from 43rd and State Street to 51st Street,
translation.it: Nella zona tra la quarantatreesima, State Street e la cinquantunesima,

translation.en: there must've been 200 to 300 black businesses that were vibrant.
translation.it: ci saranno state trecento fiorenti attività nere.

translation.en: Segregated, of course. All black.
translation.it: Era un ghetto ovviamente. Tutti neri.

translation.en: It was like a black Wall Street.
translation.it: Era come una Wall Street nera.

translation.en: Churches everywhere on every block.
translation.it: C'erano chiese ovunque, in ogni isolato.

translation.en: There is no black politics at this moment in time without the black church.
translation.it: Tutta la politica nera dell'epoca si basava sulla chiesa.

translation.en: If you were a popular gospel singer, as Sam Cooke eventually would become,
translation.it: Se eri un famoso cantante gospel, come diventerà poi Sam Cooke,

translation.en: you would rub elbows with a young Martin Luther King, right?
translation.it: saresti stato gomito a gomito con un giovane Martin Luther King, ok?

translation.en: You would know who Reverend C.L. Franklin was,
translation.it: Avresti conosciuto il reverendo C.L. Franklin,

translation.en: who, of course, is Aretha Franklin's father
translation.it: il padre di Aretha Franklin, conosciuto come

translation.en: and generally regarded as one of the greatest preachers
translation.it: il padre di Aretha Franklin, conosciuto come uno dei più grandi pastori del ventesimo secolo.

translation.en: produced in the 20th century.
translation.it: uno dei più grandi pastori del ventesimo secolo.

translation.en: Chicago was a place where people had to figure out how to hustle for themselves,
translation.it: Chicago era un posto in cui la gente doveva cavarsela da sola,

translation.en: and I don't think it's a coincidence that Sam Cooke would eventually say,
translation.it: e non è un caso se Sam Cooke a un certo punto dirà

translation.en: "I want to own my own record label, own my own publishing company."
translation.it: "Voglio fondare una mia casa discografica."

translation.en: That's what you saw in Chicago.
translation.it: Perché Chicago era così: aziende ovunque,

translation.en: You saw businesses everywhere, and I'm sure he was impacted by that.
translation.it: Perché Chicago era così: aziende ovunque, e sono sicuro abbia influito su di lui.

translation.en: Papa Cook-- he knew that Sam was very gifted.
translation.it: Papa Cook, sapeva che Sam era dotato.

translation.en: Matter of fact, the whole Cook children, 'cause they were called the Cook children.
translation.it: In realtà tutti i bimbi Cook, venivano chiamati così,

translation.en: He took 'em around to the churches to sing.
translation.it: andavano in chiesa a cantare.

translation.en: ♪ Though I've never been up there ♪
translation.it: Anche se non sono mai stato lì su...

translation.en: I met Sam at a concert in Gary, Indiana.
translation.it: Conobbi Sam a un concerto a Gary, in Indiana.

translation.en: I was about 16 years old,
translation.it: Ricordo di aver avuto circa 16 anni,

translation.en: and Sam would had to be around 13 or 14.
translation.it: e Sam avrà avuto 13 o 14 anni.

translation.en: I went up, and I say, "Hey, man. You were somethin' else, boy."
translation.it: Sono andato da lui e gli ho detto "Ehi, bello. Sei fuori dal mondo!

translation.en: I ain't never heard nothing like this before in my life."
translation.it: Non ho mai sentito niente del genere!"

translation.en: ♪ Does Jesus care? ♪
translation.it: A Gesù importa?

translation.en: The Soul Stirrers was a top group. They were one of the biggest.
translation.it: I Soul Stirrers erano un gruppo fantastico, uno dei migliori.

translation.en: It was a really big deal when Sam was tapped as a teenager
translation.it: É stato importante quando Sam venne scelto da ragazzo

translation.en: to fill the shoes of R. H. Harris,
translation.it: per sostituire R. H. Harris,

translation.en: who was a grown man and had been around the circle.
translation.it: che era un uomo adulto ed era in giro da un po'.

translation.en: ♪ I no longer stand ♪
translation.it: Non lo sono più

translation.en: ♪ I ask my mother how ♪
translation.it: Chiedo a mia madre come...

translation.en: He starts out trying to sing some of the lead songs the way that Harris did. He was trying to reach--
translation.it: Cercò di cantare le canzoni più famose come faceva Harris.

translation.en: As the story goes, he was trying to reach this high note
translation.it: A quanto si dice, cercava di raggiungere note altissime,

translation.en: and couldn't quite reach it the way Harris did,
translation.it: e non riusciva come Harris,

translation.en: and he instinctively did this flutter
translation.it: quindi fece quest'onda,

translation.en: where he just kind of reached up for the note and just floated down.
translation.it: in cui raggiungeva la nota e poi tornava giù.

translation.en: ♪ He gave her ♪ ♪ And it was not in the well ♪ -♪ Whoa ♪ -♪ Yes ♪
translation.it: ...gliela diede e non era nel pozzo Sì!

translation.en: When you hear a track like "Jesus Gave Me Water,"
translation.it: Ascoltando una canzone come "Jesus Gave Me Water,"

translation.en: you hear Sam keepin' up with the choir, keeping the time,
translation.it: si sente che Sam seguiva il coro, il tempo,

translation.en: but then he goes into that little yodel piece, right,
translation.it: ma poi arriva quel pezzo,

translation.en: that just says that this is Sam Cooke's song now.
translation.it: in cui capisci che ora è la canzone di Sam Cooke.

translation.en: ♪ Water, water, water, water, loving water ♪ ♪ And it was not in the well ♪

translation.en: Aretha Franklin is my longest friend who is still alive.
translation.it: Aretha Franklin è l'unica amica d'infanzia ancora in vita.

translation.en: We grew up together. Occasionally, I would go to their church,
translation.it: Aretha Franklin è l'unica amica d'infanzia ancora in vita. A volte andavo nella loro chiesa, ma quando c'erano Sam e i Soul Stirrers,

translation.en: but when Sam and the Soul Stirrers came to that church,
translation.it: A volte andavo nella loro chiesa, ma quando c'erano Sam e i Soul Stirrers,

translation.en: you would've thought they were gonna have a rock concert there
translation.it: pareva ci fosse un concerto rock.

translation.en: because-- especially for women.
translation.it: Soprattutto per le donne.

translation.en: There were women who never even thought about goin' to church until...
translation.it: C'erano donne che non andavano mai in chiesa

translation.en: until Sam and the Soul Stirrers were there.
translation.it: tranne quando c'erano Sam e i Soul Stirrers.

translation.en: And they would be around the block four deep, you know, because Sam was there.
translation.it: A quel punto si accalcavano intorno all'edificio, perché c'era Sam.

translation.en: ♪ Oh, pray when you're feelin' low ♪
translation.it: Prega quando ti senti giù

translation.en: ♪ When the ill wind blows ♪ ♪ Don't forget to pray ♪
translation.it: Quando il vento maligno soffia Non dimenticare di pregare!

translation.en: I believe it was Abyssinia Baptist Church in Newark
translation.it: Credo che fosse a Newark nella Chiesa Battista Abissina,

translation.en: where the Soul Stirrers were a part of the program.
translation.it: quando cantarono i Soul Stirrers.

translation.en: I thought he was the cutest thing in the world. I was 11 years old and madly in love.
translation.it: Pensai che fosse il più carino del mondo. Avevo 11 anni ed ero innamorata persa.

translation.en: Sam Cooke joins the Soul Stirrers when he's in his late teens,
translation.it: Sam Cooke si unì ai Soul Stirrers alla fine dell'adolescenza,

translation.en: so he's 19-20 years old when he starts to go down south to tour.
translation.it: e aveva circa vent'anni quando fece il primo tour al sud.

translation.en: There was a Chitlin Circuit black artists played back in those days,
translation.it: C'erano una serie di canzoni che gli artisti neri suonavano all'epoca,

translation.en: especially through the South.
translation.it: soprattutto al Sud.

translation.en: We called it the Chitlin Circuit 'cause those places
translation.it: Lo chiamavamo Chitlin Circuit, perché molti di quei posti

translation.en: were like funky like that, you know, like, funky like chitlins.
translation.it: puzzavano come l'intestino di un maiale.

translation.en: This is the time when we were on the last legs of vaudeville
translation.it: Era l'epoca a cavallo tra la fine del varietà

translation.en: and on the beginnings of rock 'n' roll,
translation.it: e l'inizio del Rock 'n Roll,

translation.en: of-of-of that kind of R&B rock 'n' roll.
translation.it: quando era ancora R&B.

translation.en: So a lot of the places that we played were like not very much bigger than this room.
translation.it: Quindi molti posti in cui ci esibivamo non erano più grandi di questa stanza.

translation.en: They had one microphone with five of us tryin' to sing on one microphone.
translation.it: Cinque persone che cercavano di cantare con un solo microfono.

translation.en: ♪ ...a bad girl be-- ♪
translation.it: È una cattiva ragazza perché...

translation.en: And I'm singing "Bad Girl" into this guy's chest because that's how close the crowd--
translation.it: Cantavo "Bad Girl" addosso a uno perché il pubblico era vicinissimo.

translation.en: There was no stage, and we were on the floor,
translation.it: Non c'era il palco, eravamo sul pavimento

translation.en: and I'm singing "Bad Girl" into this guy's chest,
translation.it: e io cantavo "Bad Girl" contro il suo petto

translation.en: and people behind him are yellin' and screamin',
translation.it: e la gente dietro urlava:

translation.en: "Move out of the way. We can't see."
translation.it: "Spostati! Non vediamo nulla!"

translation.en: And so that's an example of what some of that stuff was like.
translation.it: Giusto per farvi capire com'era all'epoca.

translation.en: In traveling the South with the Soul Stirrers,
translation.it: Viaggiando a Sud con i Soul Stirrers, si trovarono davanti

translation.en: they're dealing with where they can stay,
translation.it: Viaggiando a Sud con i Soul Stirrers, si trovarono davanti posti assegnati per dormire, per mangiare, restrizioni sul pubblico.

translation.en: where they can eat, the audiences they can play to.
translation.it: posti assegnati per dormire, per mangiare, restrizioni sul pubblico.

translation.en: At that moment, you know, he's a kid.
translation.it: All'epoca, lui era un ragazzo.

translation.en: He's got to go with what's going on, but it really pained him,
translation.it: Doveva accettarlo, ma era doloroso per lui

translation.en: you know, the heavy yoke of-of the Jim Crow laws,
translation.it: Doveva accettarlo, ma era doloroso per lui sopportare le leggi di Jim Crow.

translation.en: which was something he wasn't really that accustomed to,
translation.it: Era qualcosa a cui non era abituato,

translation.en: but had to get used to pretty quickly.
translation.it: ma doveva farlo in fretta.

translation.en: The conditions were very hard and very prejudice.
translation.it: Era una situazione difficile e piena di pregiudizi.

translation.en: There were places in the South where we couldn't even stay in the hotels.
translation.it: C'erano posti in cui non potevi neanche alloggiare in hotel.

translation.en: We'd have to stay in rooming houses.
translation.it: Dovevamo stare nelle pensioni.

translation.en: We used to have to sleep in mortuaries with six bodies there,
translation.it: Dormivamo negli obitori, con sei cadaveri. Noi dormivamo su una branda, e c'erano sei nelle bare.

translation.en: us sleepin' in a cot with six bodies in caskets, you know.
translation.it: con sei cadaveri. Noi dormivamo su una branda, e c'erano sei nelle bare.

translation.en: Sam, he didn't like the Chitlin Circuit
translation.it: A Sam non piaceva il Chitlin Circuit

translation.en: because he wanted to be able to go where he wanted to go, you know.
translation.it: perché voleva poter andare dove voleva.

translation.en: After he went on that tour down south,
translation.it: Fece quel tour al Sud.

translation.en: he came back, and he says, "Scoe, it's a shame how people is being treated.
translation.it: Tornò e disse: "Scoe è vergognoso come venga trattata la gente.

translation.en: Somebody should do something about it."
translation.it: Bisogna fare qualcosa."

translation.en: So only thing I could say I know what he was talkin' about
translation.it: Potevo solo dirgli che sapevo cosa intendesse

translation.en: because I had been through the same-- some of the same things myself.
translation.it: perché avevo passato le stesse cose.

translation.en: I was comin' from school, and I was on the sidewalk walkin',

translation.en: how to walk on the sidewalk with a white man."
translation.it: a camminare con un bianco sul marciapiede, negro."

translation.en: You're talking about a time
translation.it: Parliamo di quando

translation.en: where a little black boy, 14 years old, who was also from Chicago,
translation.it: un ragazzino nero, di 14 anni. Anche lui di Chicago,

translation.en: with roots in Mississippi, just like Sam Cooke,
translation.it: originario del Mississippi, come Sam Cooke...

translation.en: Emmet Till allegedly whistled at a white woman,

translation.en: and he was beaten savagely in Money, Mississippi,
translation.it: e fu picchiato selvaggiamente, a Money, in Mississippi.

translation.en: and had a fan tied around his neck and was killed.
translation.it: Fu ritrovato morto, con una pala appesa al collo.

translation.en: Sam and I-- we talked about Emmett Till a lot.
translation.it: Io e Sam parlammo molto di Emmett Till.

translation.en: We was wondering just how could that be possible?
translation.it: Ci chiedevamo come fosse possibile.

translation.en: We didn't understand it at all.
translation.it: Non riuscivamo a capire.

translation.en: When we saw the picture, I think Sam felt really hurt on a personal level.
translation.it: Quando vedemmo la foto, penso che Sam sia sconvolto nel profondo.

translation.en: Sam thought that there's got to be something that can be done.
translation.it: Sam pensava bisognasse fare qualcosa.

translation.en: We're living in a world where we pay taxes, and we're law-abiding people, you know what I mean?
translation.it: Viviamo in un mondo in cui paghiamo le tasse e rispettiamo la legge, no?

translation.en: This should not happen to a 14-year-old anywhere, you know,
translation.it: Un quattordicenne non dovrebbe passare tutto questo. Da nessuna parte. Era molto arrabbiato per questo.

translation.en: so he was, like, very bitter about that.
translation.it: Da nessuna parte. Era molto arrabbiato per questo.

translation.en: It was a wake-up call,
translation.it: Fu un campanello d'allarme,

translation.en: and it was actually, the really, the beginning of the Civil Rights movement.
translation.it: l'inizio del movimento per i diritti civili.

translation.en: Sam had things on his mind that he wanted to do,
translation.it: Sam voleva fare molte cose,

translation.en: and he especially wanted to help his people, our people, and he was determined to do that.
translation.it: tra cui aiutare la sua gente. Ed era determinato a farlo.

translation.en: And he told me, "'Scoe, one of these days, the world gonna know Sam Cooke,
translation.it: Mi disse "Scoe, uno di questi giorni, il mondo conoscerà il mio nome.

translation.en: and I'm gonna help my people."
translation.it: E io aiuterò la mia gente."

translation.en: You know, I guess it was because of the fear of Jesus.

translation.it: o canti la musica del Signore o quella del diavolo.

translation.en: And there's a kind of a guilt complex that gets tied to that because you're like,
translation.it: E ti rimane il senso di colpa perché ti dici:

translation.it: "Voglio cantare la musica del Signore, ma quella del Diavolo mi fa ballare.

translation.en: Dick Clark from American Bandstand
translation.it: Dick Clark dell'etichetta American Bandstand

translation.en: was also a concert promoter all around the country,
translation.it: organizzava anche concerti in tutto il Paese

translation.en: and he hired Sam Cooke to come down to Atlanta and to do a live show.

translation.en: Dick Clark has such an impact in terms of how young folks listen to American music.

translation.en: If you're Sam Cooke, you had to be on that show.

translation.en: Sam was about the only black, or I should say negro singer at the time on the show,
translation.it: Sam era l'unico cantante nero nello show all'epoca,

translation.en: and the Klan members down there had a problem with that.
translation.it: e il Ku Klux Klan non era molto d'accordo.

translation.en: Suddenly, there are threats coming from the KKK
translation.it: All'improvviso arrivarono minacce dal KKK

translation.en: suggesting that perhaps you should not go up on that stage.
translation.it: che dicevano "Forse non è il caso di salire sul palco."

translation.en: Ku Klux Klan had just bombed a Jewish synagogue down there,

translation.en: so we know they meant business.
translation.it: quindi non scherzavano.

translation.en: Sam told us Dick was thinking about canceling
translation.it: Sam ci disse che Dick pensava di annullare tutto

translation.it: a causa delle lettere minatorie che riceveva

translation.en: That's just the way it was, you know.

translation.en: Dick Clark did what a powerful white man would do.
translation.it: Dick Clark fece quello che un bianco di successo avrebbe fatto.

translation.en: He called the National Guard to keep people safe from the KKK,
translation.it: Chiamò la Guardia Nazionale per tenere la gente al sicuro dal KKK.

translation.en: but what Dick Clark didn't know
translation.it: Ma quello che lui non sapeva,

translation.en: that probably most black people in Atlanta knew
translation.it: e che sapevano i neri di Atlanta,

translation.en: that you probably couldn't trust the National Guard, either.
translation.it: è che non ci si poteva fidare neanche dell'esercito.

translation.en: That's how pervasive this was.

translation.en: [Dick] Welcome aboard. It's nice to have you here on a Saturday night.

translation.en: [Dick] It's Sam Cooke.

translation.en: absolutely courageous, absolutely fearless, because he was breaking boundaries, you know,
translation.it: ...con coraggio, e senza alcuna paura perché era lì per abbattere le barriere.

translation.en: and I think Sam realized very early on "This is bigger than me."

translation.en: I am skilled, I can compete with the best of them.
translation.it: Sono dotato. E posso competere con i migliori."

translation.en: And in fact, there was an audience within white America that was very interested in having me seen there."
translation.it: E c'era un pubblico anche tra i bianchi che voleva vederlo su quel palco.

translation.it: Entrammo in questo locale e ci sedemmo.

translation.en: and we sat down and were asked to stand up.
translation.it: Entrammo in questo locale e ci sedemmo. E ci venne chiesto di alzarci.

translation.en: And we asked. I said, "Are you gonna take our orders?"
translation.it: Quindi chiedemmo: "Volete prendere i nostri ordini?"

translation.en: "You gotta shut up and wait till I get to you."
translation.it: "Stai zitta e aspetta il tuo turno!"

translation.en: So me and my big mouth. I said, "You know what you can do?
translation.it: Quindi io, con la mia boccaccia, le ho detto "Sai cosa puoi fare?

translation.en: Take that order and shove it." And we left.
translation.it: Puoi prendere quell'ordine e andare a fanculo!" E ce ne andammo.

translation.en: Ten minutes later, there was a police officer...
translation.it: Dieci minuti dopo, un poliziotto...

translation.en: that came to the bus...
translation.it: ...raggiunse l'autobus...

translation.en: and he stepped onto the bus.
translation.it: ...e salì.

translation.en: And Sam said, "Can I help you?"
translation.it: E Sam disse: "Posso aiutarla?"

translation.en: He said, "Yeah, we wanna know who those two gals were
translation.it: E lui: "Sì, vogliamo sapere chi erano quelle due pupe

translation.en: that were rude to the waitress in the tavern house."
translation.it: che hanno trattato male la cameriera al bar."

translation.en: And Sam says, "First of all, we don't have gals on our bus.
translation.it: E Sam rispose: "Prima di tutto, non ci sono pupe su quest'autobus.

translation.en: We have ladies and gentlemen...
translation.it: Ci sono signore e signori...

translation.en: and this happens to be my bus. It's private property,
translation.it: ...e questo è il mio autobus. È proprietà privata,

translation.en: and I'm gonna ask you kindly to step off of it."
translation.it: quindi devo chiederle gentilmente di scendere."

translation.en: He thought about who he was
translation.it: Capì chi era

translation.en: and those around him, who they were,
translation.it: e chi erano quelli che aveva intorno.

translation.en: and that they were not going to take advantage of anybody that he cared about.
translation.it: E che nessuno si sarebbe approfittato dei suoi cari.

translation.en: I will never forget the day
translation.it: Non dimenticherò mai il giorno in cui non potei

translation.en: I was unable to fulfill a one-night singing engagement in Georgia
translation.it: Non dimenticherò mai il giorno in cui non potei  esibirmi a una serata in Georgia.

translation.en: because I wouldn't sit in a Jim Crow bus,
translation.it: Perché non volevo sedermi in un autobus per neri,

translation.en: and because no white taxicab driver would take me from the airport to the city.
translation.it: e nessun tassista bianco mi avrebbe portato in città.

translation.en: And negro cab drivers were not permitted to bring their cabs into the airport.
translation.it: E i tassisti neri non potevano portare i taxi in aeroporto.

translation.en: We used to play places in the South whereas the audiences,
translation.it: Al Sud suonavamo in posti in cui il pubblico,

translation.en: even though they were integrated, they were segregated
translation.it: seppur misto, era diviso.

translation.en: because the white people would be upstairs,
translation.it: I bianchi stavano sopra,

translation.en: and the black people would be downstairs or vice versa.
translation.it: e i neri sotto o il contrario.

translation.en: Or there'd be a big stage in the center of this arena,
translation.it: Oppure c'era un grosso palco al centro,

translation.en: and white people would be on one side, black people on the other, not even hardly lookin' at each other.
translation.it: con i bianchi da un lato e i neri dall'altro, che a malapena si guardavano.

translation.en: They had signs that said, "General Admission--2.50.
translation.it: C'erano cartelli che dicevano "Biglietto: $2.50.

translation.en: White spectators--a dollar and a half."
translation.it: Spettatori bianchi: $1.50."

translation.en: They'd sit up in the top of the places
translation.it: Si sedevano in alto e guardavano i neri ballare.

translation.en: and watch the black people dance, you know. It was sickening.
translation.it: Si sedevano in alto e guardavano i neri ballare. Era disgustoso.

translation.en: ♪ Someone really loves you ♪
translation.it: Qualcuno ti ama davvero

translation.en: ♪ Guess who ♪
translation.it: Indovina chi?

translation.en: -♪ Guess who ♪ -There was a friend of... Jesse Belvin.
translation.it: C'era un amico... Jesse Belvin.

translation.en: In February of 1960, Jesse played the first integrated show in Arkansas.
translation.it: Nel febbraio del 1960, Jesse suonò per il primo pubblico misto in Arkansas.

translation.en: It was a big deal.
translation.it: Era un grosso evento.

translation.en: After the show was over, everybody left, went their separate ways,
translation.it: Quando lo spettacolo finì, se ne andarono tutti,

translation.en: and about a half an hour out on the road, Jesse Belvin had a... head-on-head-on collision,
translation.it: e circa un'ora e mezza dopo, Jesse Belvin fece un frontale.

translation.en: and it was fatal.
translation.it: Fu fatale.

translation.en: [Davis] Jesse Belvin, his wife, and three other people died.
translation.it: Jesse Belvin e sua moglie morirono insieme ad altre tre persone.

translation.en: At first, we thought it was an accident,
translation.it: All'inizio pensammo fosse un incidente, ma

translation.en: but later, we found out that his tires had been cut by some locals in the area.
translation.it: All'inizio pensammo fosse un incidente, ma in seguito scoprimmo che gente del posto gli aveva bucato le gomme.

translation.en: It was very, very shocking, you know, 'cause he had a great future ahead of him.
translation.it: Fu davvero scioccante, perché aveva un brillante futuro.

translation.en: Of course it was a message.
translation.it: Ovviamente era un messaggio.

translation.en: I think Sam sort of saw that potential and wanted him to be a bigger star,
translation.it: Penso che Sam ne abbia visto il potenziale e volesse che fosse famoso,

translation.en: and in that sort of terrible way, he was just sort of cut down. He was gone.
translation.it: e a un certo punto era morto, in quel modo orribile.

translation.en: So now he wasn't just carrying Emmett Till,
translation.it: Quindi non doveva portare solo il peso di Emmett Till,

translation.en: he was also carrying Jesse Belvin with him and the things that he wanted to do
translation.it: ma anche quello di Jesse Belvin, con tutte le cose che voleva fare

translation.en: and the ways that he wanted to break down racism.
translation.it: e come voleva abbattere il razzismo.

translation.en: On May 12th, 1961,
translation.it: Il 12 maggio 1961,

translation.en: we were playin' the Memphis City Auditorium.
translation.it: suonavamo all'Auditorium di Memphis.

translation.en: Sam Cooke, Jackie Wilson. It was at least about 12 acts.
translation.it: Sam Cooke, Jackie Wilson. Erano almeno 12 numeri.

translation.en: So Sam asked the people that's in charge,
translation.it: Quindi Sam chiese ai responsabili,

translation.en: "Would the blacks sit at in the auditorium?"
translation.it: "I neri sederanno in Auditorium?"

translation.en: The guy say, "Well, the back and the balcony, but they can't be up-front."
translation.it: E il tizio: "Sì, in fondo e in galleria, così non stanno in prima fila."

translation.en: So Sam said, "Well..." He said, "I can't perform here."
translation.it: Allora Sam disse... "Non posso esibirmi qui."

translation.en: Sam would say... "How does it look?
translation.it: Sam diceva... "Che mi rappresenta?

translation.en: You know, I'm a star, and I'm known the world over...
translation.it: Sono una star, sono famoso in tutto il mondo...

translation.en: but in my own home country...
translation.it: ...ma nel mio Paese...

translation.en: I'm goin' along with some shit like this.
translation.it: ...devo sopportare questa merda.

translation.en: I'm gonna perform while my people is up in the balcony,
translation.it: Non mi esibisco mentre la mia gente, è in galleria e quelli al piano di sotto possono ballare e divertirsi.

translation.en: and the people downstairs can dance and have a good time,
translation.it: è in galleria e quelli al piano di sotto possono ballare e divertirsi.

translation.en: but my people can't dance?
translation.it: Perché la mia gente no?

translation.en: I don't care what nobody else do. I ain't goin' for that shit."
translation.it: Non mi importa degli altri. Io non ci sto."

translation.en: Sam gathered a meeting with all of the entertainers...
translation.it: Sam riunì tutti quelli che dovevano esibirsi...

translation.en: to boycott the show.
translation.it: ...per boicottare lo spettacolo.

translation.en: And everybody agreed,
translation.it: Tutti erano d'accordo

translation.en: "Yeah. Yeah, Sam. You're right. You're right. Yeah, we with you, man."
translation.it: "Sì, Sam! Hai ragione! Siamo con te, amico!"

translation.en: Went back to the hotel.
translation.it: Tornammo all'hotel.

translation.en: I went to Beetle Street first and got me some bourbon.
translation.it: Io andai a Beetle Street a bere del bourbon.

translation.en: I laid down, took a little nap.
translation.it: Poi ho fatto un pisolino...

translation.en: And I got up later...
translation.it: Quando mi sono svegliato, più tardi,

translation.en: everybody-- I went round and knocked.
translation.it: se ne erano andati tutti

translation.en: Everybody had gone and went back to the auditorium.
translation.it: se ne erano andati tutti ed erano tornati all'Auditorium.

translation.en: I went to Sam's room. He was in the room. Had on a-- never will forget.
translation.it: Andai in camera di Sam. Era lì, non lo dimenticherò mai, con una maglietta bianca.

translation.en: He had on a white T-shirt, and he watching television.
translation.it: Era lì, non lo dimenticherò mai, con una maglietta bianca. e guardava la tv.

translation.en: And I says, "Sam, they all gone."
translation.it: Gli ho detto "Sam, se ne sono andati tutti!"

translation.en: I said, "They said they was gonna stick with you," you know.
translation.it: Gli ho detto "Sam, se ne sono andati tutti!" "Avevano detto che sarebbero rimasti con te."

translation.en: He say, "Yeah, I know." He said, "But..." He said, "I'm not goin'."
translation.it: E lui mi disse "Sì, lo so. Ma io non vado."

translation.en: I'm not sure that Jesse Belvin's death
translation.it: Non so se la morte di Jesse Belvin

translation.en: had an effect on the outcome of this boycott Sam was trying to do
translation.it: abbia influito sui risultati del tentato boicottaggio di Sam

translation.en: because they was afraid what could happen to them.
translation.it: perché temevano potesse succedergli lo stesso.

translation.en: He was takin' a big risk.
translation.it: Stava rischiando grosso.

translation.en: He could've been hurt or killed there, you know, at that time, you know.
translation.it: Potevano ferirlo o ucciderlo, all'epoca.

translation.en: That's when I saw him in a different-- I had never seen that in him before.
translation.it: In quel momento lo vidi... Era una cosa che non avevo mai notato in lui prima.

translation.en: And the hotel that time was the Lorraine.
translation.it: E quell'hotel era il Lorraine.

translation.en: Same hotel Martin Luther King was killed at some years later.
translation.it: Lo stesso in cui qualche anno dopo fu ucciso Martin Luther King.

translation.en: I've always detested people of any color, religion or nationality
translation.it: Ho sempre odiato la gente di qualsiasi colore, religione o nazionalità

translation.en: who lack courage to stand up and be counted.
translation.it: a cui mancasse il coraggio di fare la differenza.

translation.en: It is a difficult thing to do.
translation.it: È difficile da fare.

translation.en: I hope, by refusing to play to a segregated audience,
translation.it: Spero che rifiutarmi di esibirmi per un pubblico diviso,

translation.en: it would help to break down racial segregation here.
translation.it: possa aiutare ad abbattere la segregazione razziale.

translation.en: And if I'm ever booked here again, it won't be necessary to do a similar thing.
translation.it: E che non ci sia più bisogno di fare una cosa simile se tornerò a suonare qui.

translation.en: ♪ Alabama's got me so upset ♪
translation.it: L'Alabama mi ha fatto arrabbiare

translation.en: ♪ Tennessee made me lose my rest ♪
translation.it: Il Tennessee mi ha tolto il sonno

translation.en: ♪ Everybody knows about Mississippi ♪ ♪ God... damn ♪
translation.it: Tutti conoscono il maledetto Mississippi!

translation.en: During that time period, there were major artists,
translation.it: In quel periodo, artisti di spicco

translation.en: Nina Simone comes to mind,
translation.it: come Nina Simone,

translation.en: whose music would get banned from parts of the country
translation.it: le cui canzoni vennero proibite in alcuni Stati

translation.en: for some of their political stances.
translation.it: per le loro idee politiche.

translation.en: And Sam was taking a big risk by saying, "I don't wanna play in a segregated space,"
translation.it: Perciò Sam rischiava molto dicendo: "Non mi esibisco per il segregazionismo."

translation.en: you know, particularly because he was a major star.
translation.it: Soprattutto perché era molto famoso.

translation.en: ♪ That's the sound of the men ♪ ♪ Working on the chain gang ♪
translation.it: Questo è il suono di uomini a lavoro Legati a delle catene...

translation.en: Folks who didn't understand that Sam actually had some political concerns,
translation.it: La gente non capiva che Sam era interessato alla politica.

translation.en: you listen to a song like "Chain Gang," which just the rhythm of the song immediately would resonate
translation.it: Basta ascoltare canzoni come "Chain Gang": il ritmo della canzone risuona

translation.en: for generations of black folks who know about places like Parchman
translation.it: per generazioni e generazioni di neri che conoscevano Parchman

translation.en: and other prison farms.
translation.it: e le altre prigioni.

translation.en: Yet you see these photos of Hugo and Luigi, his two producers, and Sam Cooke,
translation.it: Nonostante questo giravano foto di Hugo e Luigi, i produttori, e Sam Cooke

translation.en: and they're comically dressed up in their black-and-whites and little caps,
translation.it: vestiti a righe bianche e nere con tanto di berretto.

translation.en: and so it's a way to take this song and bring it to mainstream white America,
translation.it: Era un modo di diffondere la canzone nell'America bianca,

translation.en: but is also delivering a particular kind of critique
translation.it: e allo stesso tempo portare avanti una critica

translation.en: of what would've been a prison industrial complex of the late 1950s,
translation.it: sui complessi industriali carcerari della fine degli anni '50,

translation.en: in which white audiences and black audiences hear that very, very differently.
translation.it: un argomento che bianchi e neri colsero in maniera molto diversa.

translation.en: And there had been so few examples of black artists who could code switch in that way
translation.it: C'erano ben pochi esempi di artisti neri in grado di cambiare registro in quel modo

translation.en: and be recognized in both the black world and the white world and still be men.
translation.it: ed essere conosciuti sia nel mondo nero che nel mondo bianco, ed essere uomini.

translation.en: What white people have to do
translation.it: I bianchi dovrebbero

translation.en: is try to find out in their own hearts
translation.it: cercare nel proprio cuore

translation.en: why it was necessary to have a nigger in the first place
translation.it: prima di tutto, il motivo per cui dovrebbe esistere un negro.

translation.en: because I'm not a nigger. I am a man.
translation.it: Perché io non sono un negro. Sono un uomo.

translation.en: If I'm not the nigger here...
translation.it: Se io non sono un negro...

translation.en: and if you invented him, you, the white people, invented him...
translation.it: ...siete voi bianchi ad averlo inventato...

translation.en: then you got to find out why.
translation.it: ...e dovete scoprire perché.

translation.en: James Baldwin was one of his favorite authors.
translation.it: James Baldwin era uno dei suoi scrittori preferiti.

translation.en: He captured his attention.
translation.it: Attirò la sua attenzione.

translation.en: Baldwin was a deep writer.
translation.it: Era uno scrittore molto profondo.

translation.en: I could understand...
translation.it: Capisco...

translation.en: Sam respecting him and pickin' up on his...
translation.it: perché Sam lo rispettasse e cogliesse il suo

translation.en: meaning and what he's contributing.
translation.it: significato e il suo contributo.

translation.en: He says, "You guys got to read."
translation.it: Diceva "Ragazzi, dovete leggere."

translation.en: And we weren't really carin' about no books or nothin' like that.
translation.it: E a noi non importava molto dei libri o roba simile.

translation.en: You know, we just wanted to sing and be on television and stuff.
translation.it: E a noi non importava molto dei libri o roba simile. Volevamo solo cantare e finire in televisione.

translation.en: But he's like, "Man, that's not all of it."
translation.it: Ma lui diceva "Non basta!"

translation.en: He say, "You got to be knowledgeable."
translation.it: "Dovete essere colti!"

translation.en: The country has arbitrarily declared
translation.it: Il Paese ha affermato arbitrariamente che

translation.en: that kinky hair and dark skin, wide nose and big lips
translation.it: i capelli crespi, la pelle scura, il naso largo e le labbra carnose

translation.en: is a hideous thing to be afflicted with.
translation.it: siano una malattia rivoltante!

translation.en: Sam was the one who started the black guys...
translation.it: Sam fu il primo a portare...

translation.en: to wearin' fros.
translation.it: ...i capelli afro.

translation.en: ♪ My baby couldn't do the cha-cha-cha ♪
translation.it: La mia piccola non sapeva fare il cha-cha-cha!

translation.en: -♪ I told her ♪ -Before that, our hair was processed,
translation.it: Le dissi... Prima i nostri capelli venivano trattati tirati indietro, con le onde eccetera.

translation.en: and we were wearin' the slickback, the waves, and all that stuff like that.
translation.it: Prima i nostri capelli venivano trattati tirati indietro, con le onde eccetera.

translation.en: Sam said, "No, that won't be me."
translation.it: Sam disse: "No, io non lo farò."

translation.en: ♪ She likes her cha-cha-cha ♪
translation.it: Le piace il cha-cha-cha...

translation.en: He went on TV, where his mother almost passed out because of the hair.
translation.it: Andò in televisione, e sua madre rischiò l'infarto per i suoi capelli!

translation.en: Heh. She did not like it, and she said,
translation.it: Non le piacevano, disse:

translation.en: "Oh, look at my child."
translation.it: "Povero bambino mio!"

translation.en: Sam would talk to L.C. about,
translation.it: Sam disse a L.C.

translation.en: "Man, you ought to get that process out your hair and let it go natural."
translation.it: "Dovresti toglierti quella roba dai capelli e lasciarli al naturale!"

translation.en: He felt that it was part of his history... his culture.
translation.it: Li considerava parte della sua storia... ...della sua cultura.

translation.en: Switched over immediately.
translation.it: Fu una cosa immediata.

translation.en: All the black guys started gettin' the fros, you know. Sam was a powerful man.
translation.it: Tutti i neri iniziarono a portare l'afro. Sam era un uomo importante.

translation.en: We were in Atlanta,
translation.it: Eravamo ad Atlanta,

translation.en: and in between concerts, he'd go to a newsstand and buy every magazine,
translation.it: e nelle pause tra un concerto e l'altro andava in edicola e comprava giornali,

translation.en: and one day, he went and bought a boxing magazine.
translation.it: e un giorno ne prese uno sulla boxe.

translation.en: And there was this guy.
translation.it: E c'era questo tipo.

translation.en: I said, "Sam, this kid is the shit."
translation.it: Gli dissi "Sam, questo ragazzino è fantastico."

translation.en: He said, "All right, go get him."
translation.it: Lui disse "Ok, va' da lui."

translation.en: And I said, "What do you mean?" He said, "Tell him I sent you."
translation.it: E io dissi "Che vuoi dire?" "Digli solo che ti mando io."

translation.en: I said, "Oh, my God."
translation.it: Oh mio Dio.

translation.en: I knock on his door. His brother Rudy cracks the door, and I said,
translation.it: Bussai alla sua porta. Il fratello, Rudy, aprì uno spiraglio e dissi

translation.en: "I'm with the William Morris--" and he slams the door in my face.
translation.it: "Sono della William Morris" e lui mi sbatté la porta in faccia.

translation.en: And I said... "Sam Cooke."
translation.it: Quindi dissi... "Sam Cooke!"

translation.en: And his mother said, "Let that boy in."
translation.it: E la madre disse... ..."Fallo entrare!"

translation.en: And his mother couldn't stop talking about Sam.
translation.it: Sua madre non la smetteva di parlare di Sam.

translation.en: So, we made a deal to do an album...
translation.it: Quindi ci accordammo per un disco...

translation.en: and they really bonded.
translation.it: ...e legarono tantissimo.

translation.en: Sam was God to him.
translation.it: Sam era felicissimo.

translation.en: This is Sam Cooke. As you can see, like me, he's awful pretty.
translation.it: Ecco Sam Cooke. Come vedete, è bellissimo, proprio come me.

translation.en: -Ha ha. -And we are here now workin' on a record called "The Gang's All Here."
translation.it: E ora stiamo lavorando a un disco che si chiama "The Gang's All Here."

translation.en: Would you like to give us a preview of this disc?
translation.it: Vi va di darci un assaggio?

translation.en: We'll do a lot better if we had the music here with us, but we'll try.
translation.it: Sarebbe meglio se avessimo la base. Ma ci proviamo.

translation.en: -♪ Hey, hey, the gang's all here ♪ -[bangs beat on desk]
translation.it: Ehi, ehi, la banda è qui!

translation.en: ♪ Join in the fun ♪
translation.it: Divertiti con noi!

translation.en: ♪ Hey, hey, the gang's all here ♪
translation.it: Ehi, ehi, la banda è qui!

translation.en: ♪ We gonna swing as one ♪
translation.it: Seguiamo il ritmo!

translation.en: ♪ Do it again now... ♪
translation.it: Ancora una volta!

translation.en: The joy that they brought out of each other and the laughter--
translation.it: Quando erano insieme ridevano sempre,

translation.en: they were showing a range of emotions together.
translation.it: erano pieni di gioia, di emozioni.

translation.en: A kind of black male freedom, if you will.
translation.it: Erano liberi di essere neri, se vogliamo.

translation.en: That was not really--heh--
translation.it: Non era qualcosa...

translation.en: something we saw a lot of at that time in America.
translation.it: ...che si vedeva spesso in America all'epoca.

translation.en: You know, you always saw, up until that point,
translation.it: Fino a quel momento c'erano solo immagini stereotipate

translation.en: these really harsh, stereotypical images of black people
translation.it: Fino a quel momento c'erano solo immagini stereotipate di neri che erano macchiette, facevano i buffoni,

translation.en: who were either, you know, buffoons and clowns
translation.it: di neri che erano macchiette, facevano i buffoni,

translation.en: and, you know, exaggerated facial expressions,
translation.it: di neri che erano macchiette, facevano i buffoni, con delle espressioni esagerate, gli occhi di fuori, eccetera.

translation.en: eyes bugging out, stuff like that.
translation.it: con delle espressioni esagerate, gli occhi di fuori, eccetera.

translation.en: ♪ We gonna swing as one ♪
translation.it: Seguiamo il ritmo!

translation.en: -How you like that? -Let's think about a young Michael Jackson
translation.it: Vi piace? Pensiamo a un giovane Michael Jackson,

translation.en: or a young Prince Rogers Nelson,
translation.it: o a un giovane Prince Rogers Nelson,

translation.en: who would've been five or six years old,
translation.it: di cinque o sei anni,

translation.en: sitting around the television watching these two young men.
translation.it: seduti davanti la televisione a guardarli.

translation.en: What Ali and Sam Cooke represented was possibility.
translation.it: Ali e Sam Cooke rappresentavano la possibilità.

translation.en: Right? That there was another way for them to be in the world
translation.it: Erano la prova che si poteva avere un'esistenza diversa

translation.en: other than the way that the world had dictated that black men had to be in the world.
translation.it: da quella che il mondo aveva deciso per i neri.

translation.en: It disturbed perceptions of what black masculinity was.
translation.it: Disturbava la percezione della mascolinità nera del tempo.

translation.en: Cassius Clay very quietly was being mentored by a man named Malcolm X,
translation.it: Cassius Clay ebbe come mentore un uomo di nome Malcolm X,

translation.en: who was this fearless, and very much feared, black leader in America
translation.it: un leader americano nero senza paura, ma temuto,

translation.en: who spoke, as he said, truth to power.
translation.it: che si rapportava ai potenti.

translation.en: It's not hate to say that we were kidnapped and brought here. It's true.
translation.it: Non è odio dire che siamo stati rapiti e portati qui, è vero.

translation.en: It's not hate to say we were Jim Crowed, discriminated, and segregated. It's true.
translation.it: Non è odio dire che ci sono state le leggi Crow, che siamo stati discriminati, è vero.

translation.en: Sam Cooke doesn't know Malcolm X yet,
translation.it: Sam Cooke ancora non conosceva Malcolm X,

translation.en: but he's just seen how the Nation of Islam moves, how they dealing with white supremacy,
translation.it: ma aveva visto come la Nation of Islam affrontava la supremazia bianca,

translation.en: He's, "Oh, this is kind of interesting." Right?
translation.it: e pensava fosse interessante.

translation.it: come Jackie Wilson e James Brown, mettere insieme i soldi, fondare una casa discografica

translation.en: And he grabbed both of my arms
translation.it: Mi ha afferrato le braccia

translation.en: and started twistin' 'em and asked me where was the girl.
translation.it: e ha iniziato a scuotermi, chiedendomi dove fosse la ragazza.

translation.en: I started kickin' ,and I-- he maybe have a bite. I don't know.
translation.it: L'ho colpito potrebbe avere un morso. Non lo so,

translation.en: But I tried bite him through that jacket.
translation.it: ho cercato di morderlo attraverso la giacca.

translation.en: [man] You tried to bite Mr. Cooke?
translation.it: - Ha cercato di mordere il signor Cooke? - Sì, stavo lottando

translation.en: Yeah, I was fightin', scratchin', bitin' and everything.
translation.it: - Ha cercato di mordere il signor Cooke? - Sì, stavo lottando e tutto.

translation.en: Finally, I got up and grabbed a pistol.
translation.it: Sono riuscita a liberarmi e ho preso una pistola.

translation.en: I started shootin'.
translation.it: Ho iniziato a sparare.

translation.en: [man] And how many times did you fire this pistol?
translation.it: Quante volte ha sparato?

translation.en: Three times.
translation.it: Tre volte.

translation.en: Did you know you struck Mr. Cooke?
translation.it: Sapeva di averlo colpito?

translation.en: Yes, 'cause he said, "Lady, you shot me."
translation.it: Sì, perché disse "Ehi, mi hai sparato!"

translation.en: I didn't believe that Sam was killed the way they say they did.
translation.it: Non ho creduto alla loro versione dei fatti.

translation.en: I didn't make sense of that, and Papa Cook didn't make sense of that.
translation.it: Non aveva senso, né per me né per Papa Cook.

translation.en: I don't believe it. That's far as I go with that.
translation.it: Non ci credo. E basta.

translation.en: That just didn't sound like him at all, at all.
translation.it: Non sembrava una cosa da lui. Per niente.

translation.en: I never seen him be aggressively at-at-at a lady.
translation.it: Non è mai stato aggressivo con le donne.

translation.en: Sam wasn't that kind of a guy.
translation.it: Non era il tipo.

translation.en: [stammers] That's totally bullshit.
translation.it: Sono tutte stronzate.

translation.en: He wasn't that kind of a guy that had to be domineering or have power over people.
translation.it: Non era il tipo che doveva dominare gli altri.

translation.en: I never saw that in Sam ever.
translation.it: Non è una cosa da Sam.

translation.en: It turns out that she was a hooker, and she was a Hollywood hooker.
translation.it: Si scoprì che lei era una prostituta di Hollywood.

translation.en: There was the idea that the girl had come to this place before,
translation.it: Si pensava che la ragazza fosse già stata al motel

translation.en: and she threw his pants out the window, which had all his money in the pant--
translation.it: e che abbia lanciato dalla finestra i pantaloni, in cui teneva i soldi.

translation.en: the $5,000 I told you about earlier.
translation.it: I cinquemila dollari di cui parlavamo prima.

translation.en: Somebody was out there, her pimp,
translation.it: C'era qualcuno lì fuori, il suo pappone,

translation.en: and grabbed the pants, and then she ran out with that person.
translation.it: che ha preso i pantaloni. Sono scappati insieme.

translation.en: And rumor had it that Bertha was in with the mob.
translation.it: Voci dicono che Bertha facesse parte della mafia.

translation.en: That she was like a pimpess or something.
translation.it: Che fosse una maitresse o roba simile.

translation.en: It was ruled that Bertha Franklin shooting Sam Cooke
translation.it: L'omicidio di Sam Cooke da parte di Bertha Franklin

translation.en: was a case of justifiable homicide,
translation.it: fu considerato legittima difesa.

translation.en: and nobody bought that.
translation.it: Nessuno se la bevve.

translation.en: It just didn't seem like he was the person that got shot down in the way that he did.
translation.it: Lui non era il tipo a cui si sparava in quel modo,

translation.en: There had to be something more in play,
translation.it: doveva esserci altro in gioco,

translation.en: and that's what fueled the idea of this being some sort of conspiracy.
translation.it: e questo alimentò l'idea si trattasse di una cospirazione.

translation.en: Elvis believed that there was a sense in the music industry
translation.it: Elvis disse che nell'industria musicale si pensava

translation.en: that Sam was getting too powerful and had to be stopped,
translation.it: che Sam stesse diventando troppo potente e andasse fermato,

translation.en: which echoed what a lot of people in the black community thought.
translation.it: il che combaciava con quello che pensavano molti neri.

translation.en: You know, that this was about a black man who didn't know his place,
translation.it: Si trattava di un nero che non sapeva stare al suo posto,

translation.en: and to stop him, he had to be murdered.
translation.it: e per fermarlo bisognava ucciderlo.

translation.en: They didn't mind Sam seepin' through the cracks and being successful on his own.
translation.it: Non gli importava che Sam ce l'avesse fatta da solo.

translation.en: But the problem was that too many other entertainers
translation.it: Il problema era che troppi artisti

translation.en: were watching Sam and listening to Sam.
translation.it: lo seguivano e lo ascoltavano.

translation.en: That was the problem.
translation.it: Era quello il problema.

translation.en: There's another wild theory that Allen Klein killed Sam Cooke.
translation.it: Un'altra teoria folle era che Allen Klein avesse ucciso Sam Cooke.

translation.en: Well, from what I hear...
translation.it: Beh, da quanto ne so...

translation.en: he had the argument with Allen,
translation.it: ...avevano litigato,

translation.en: maybe two, three days before.
translation.it: un paio di giorni prima.

translation.en: Allen Klein loved Sam Cooke, but he also was a thief.
translation.it: Allen Klein adorava Sam Cooke, ma era anche un ladro.

translation.en: He used his love to steal his songs.
translation.it: Usava l'affetto per rubargli le canzoni.

translation.en: Klein was ready to take everything.
translation.it: Klein voleva prendersi tutto.

translation.en: He did a similar thing to the Rolling Stones,
translation.it: Fece una cosa simile ai Rolling Stones,

translation.en: and he was one of the forces that broke up The Beatles.
translation.it: e fu uno dei motivi della rottura dei Beatles.

translation.en: Well, the problem with that is that in 1964,
translation.it: Il problema è che nel 1964

translation.en: Allen Klein didn't have the kind of power to set up this big, elaborate murder
translation.it: Allen Klein non aveva il potere di organizzare un omicidio così elaborato,

translation.en: where the police is gonna be a part of it, too?
translation.it: includendo anche la polizia. E il procuratore distrettuale.

translation.en: And the district attorney? Allen Klein--he wasn't that powerful yet.
translation.it: includendo anche la polizia. E il procuratore distrettuale. Allen Klein non era ancora così potente.

translation.en: I was on a plane coming back from New York,
translation.it: Ero su un volo di ritorno da New York,

translation.en: and I hadn't seen Barbara in quite some time,
translation.it: e non vedevo Barbara da un po',

translation.en: and as I recall, she said, "I sold Sam's work, and I got $50,000."
translation.it: e ricordo mi disse "Ho venduto i lavori di Sam e mi hanno dato 50mila dollari." O qualche cifra ridicola.

translation.en: Or something. Some ridiculous amount of money.
translation.it: e mi hanno dato 50mila dollari." O qualche cifra ridicola.

translation.en: I mean, obviously it's worth millions and millions and millions of dollars.
translation.it: Voglio dire, valgono milioni di milioni di dollari.

translation.en: KAGS, which was the publishing company, and SAR Records...
translation.it: La Kags, che era una casa editrice, e la SAR Records...

translation.en: all went to Allen Klein.
translation.it: ...divennero proprietà di Allen Klein.

translation.en: J.W. Alexander died broke.
translation.it: J.W. Alexander morì senza un soldo.

translation.en: What it is is inequality.
translation.it: Si tratta di ineguaglianza.

translation.en: What it is is someone was in a position to take advantage and they did.
translation.it: Di qualcuno che poteva prevaricare e l'ha fatto.

translation.en: It's a double pain. The pain of losing Sam and the pain of, uh...
translation.it: È un dolore doppio. Il dolore della perdita di Sam e il dolore della perdita di ciò per cui ha lavorato,

translation.en: losing what he worked for,
translation.it: Il dolore della perdita di Sam e il dolore della perdita di ciò per cui ha lavorato,

translation.en: what he was all about, what he fought to establish.
translation.it: di ciò che aveva in mente, che ha lottato per costruire.

translation.en: Whether or not there was any real conspiracy that went down,
translation.it: Se ci sia stata o meno una cospirazione,

translation.en: we won't know because there wasn't a thorough investigation done to find out
translation.it: non lo sapremo mai perché nessuno ha mai indagato.

translation.en: because to many people in the LAPD who were investigating this case,
translation.it: Perché per la polizia di Los Angeles che si occupava del caso,

translation.en: and just to be quite frank, Sam Cooke was another nigger...
translation.it: ad essere franchi, Sam Cooke era un altro negro...

translation.en: and this was just more nigger shit.
translation.it: ...e quella era solo altra merda negra.

translation.en: And it didn't deserve any more attention than what it got.
translation.it: E non si meritava più attenzione di quella che aveva ottenuto.

translation.en: When you see someone as prominent as Sam Cooke...
translation.it: Quando qualcuno importante come Sam Cooke...

translation.en: get killed like that under very mysterious circumstances,
translation.it: ...ucciso in circostanze così misteriose,

translation.en: and even his life is not valuable enough to have a real investigation
translation.it: non ottiene neanche una vera indagine

translation.en: by local law enforcement there in Los Angeles...
translation.it: dalle forze dell'ordine di Los Angeles...

translation.en: it's not a surprise that to this day,
translation.it: ...non sorprende che anche oggi

translation.en: there are a lot of people who still believe
translation.it: molti credano ancora

translation.en: that there was some sort of cover-up,
translation.it: che la cosa sia stata insabbiata, che ci fosse una cospirazione

translation.en: some sort of conspiracy around the death of Sam Cooke.
translation.it: che la cosa sia stata insabbiata, che ci fosse una cospirazione sulla morte di Sam Cooke.

translation.en: I mean, what else are we gonna think, particularly given our history in America,
translation.it: Cos'altro dovremmo pensare, considerando la nostra storia in America,

translation.en: our relationships with law enforcement all over the country,
translation.it: com'eravamo visti dalla polizia del Paese,

translation.en: and the fact that if you happen to be a black person
translation.it: e considerando che se sei un nero e denunci situazioni,

translation.en: who speaks out in any kind of way,
translation.it: e considerando che se sei un nero e denunci situazioni, in qualsiasi modo,

translation.en: who does anything that seems to be empowering for the black community,
translation.it: o fai qualcosa che possa emancipare la comunità nera,

translation.en: you are automatically a target.
translation.it: diventi un bersaglio.

translation.en: If we were to transpose today back to then,
translation.it: Se dovessimo parlare del passato con le idee di oggi,

translation.en: we would say black lives matter. Right?
translation.it: diremmo che le vite dei neri contano. Giusto?

translation.en: And in 1964,
translation.it: Ma nel 1964, neanche la vita di Sam Cooke contava.

translation.en: even Sam Cooke's black life didn't matter. Right?
translation.it: Ma nel 1964, neanche la vita di Sam Cooke contava. O no?

translation.en: So... it's-it's-it's just hard to overcome that.
translation.it: Quindi... ...è difficile da superare.

translation.en: Do I think that the events of Sam Cooke
translation.it: Penso che quanto accaduto a Sam

translation.en: and the institutional attitude
translation.it: e l'atteggiamento delle istituzioni

translation.en: contribute to the upcoming riots here?
translation.it: abbiano contribuito a scatenare le rivolte?

translation.en: Well, absolutely. Absolutely.
translation.it: Sì, certo. Certamente.

translation.en: I don't wanna say Sam Cooke's death caused the Watts riots.
translation.it: Non voglio dire che la morte di Sam Cooke abbia causato i Fatti di Watts.

translation.en: I don't wanna say that.
translation.it: Non lo dirò.

translation.en: But Sam Cooke's death is a really big example of a million things
translation.it: Ma la sua morte è un grosso esempio di un milione di cose

translation.en: that caused dissatisfaction among black people in America.
translation.it: che causarono il malcontento nella popolazione nera in America.

translation.en: Those people being, you know, murdered, being enslaved, being imprisoned.
translation.it: Tutte le persone uccise, schiavizzate, imprigionate,

translation.en: Like, all of that, is why.
translation.it: sono il motivo.

translation.en: And Sam Cooke is yet another example of that.
translation.it: E Sam Cooke è solo un ulteriore esempio.

translation.en: Black people don't trust law enforcement for good reason.
translation.it: Se la gente di colore non si fida della legge c'è un motivo.

translation.en: It is not beyond the realm of possibility to a lot of people
translation.it: Per molti non è una cosa impossibile

translation.en: that the FBI was somehow involved in Sam Cooke's death.
translation.it: che l'FBI fosse in qualche modo coinvolto nella morte di Sam Cooke.

translation.en: That he was set up in some way,
translation.it: Che la cosa fosse organizzata,

translation.en: that he was murdered because he was just becoming too threatening,
translation.it: che sia stato ucciso perché stava diventando una minaccia,

translation.en: you know, through the work he was doing, the people he was associating with,
translation.it: a causa del suo lavoro, delle persone a cui era legato,

translation.en: and the music he was now gonna start making.
translation.it: e delle sue canzoni in quel periodo.

translation.en: See, it's one thing to have a little meeting.
translation.it: Un conto è fare una piccola riunione.

translation.en: It's another thing to put out a song that could sell a million copies
translation.it: Un altro è scrivere una canzone da milioni di copie

translation.en: and is on the radio, and everyone's gonna start to hear and absorb.
translation.it: che finirà in radio, e tutti ascolteranno e capiranno.

translation.en: So, you know, people, whether it was true or not...
translation.it: Quindi la gente, vero o falso che fosse...

translation.en: deeply felt that, you know, the government was involved in this.
translation.it: ...credeva sul serio che il governo fosse coinvolto.

translation.en: In a very short period of time...
translation.it: In breve tempo...

translation.en: Medgar Evers, Sam Cooke,
translation.it: ...Medgar Evers, Sam Cooke,

translation.en: King a little later.
translation.it: in seguito King,

translation.en: Langston Hughes isn't killed by the state, but, you know, there are very real losses.
translation.it: Langston Hughes, non ucciso dallo Stato ma, insomma, sono state perdite importanti.

translation.en: Something really...
translation.it: Qualcosa di davvero...

translation.en: powerful and important and intimate to blackness,
translation.it: ...potente e importante e legato all'essere neri,

translation.en: it gets lost with those deaths.
translation.it: è andato perso con queste morti.

translation.en: That's a part that white America will never fundamentally understand.
translation.it: È una cosa che l'America bianca non potrà mai capire.

translation.en: What we know is that we never got to see him as a fully mature artist
translation.it: Sappiamo solo che non vedremo mai la sua maturità artistica,

translation.en: and thinker and activist
translation.it: il suo impegno come filosofo e attivista,

translation.en: who, had he lived, would've had a dramatic impact on the next generation
translation.it: che, se fosse vissuto, avrebbe avuto un forte impatto sui successivi

translation.en: of artists, thinkers, and activists.
translation.it: artisti, filosofi e attivisti.

translation.en: We could've had this monument to what was to come.
translation.it: Avremmo potuto avere un monumento al futuro.

translation.en: "A Change is Gonna Come," there it is. But that's all we have.
translation.it: "A Change is Gonna Come," eccolo. Ma abbiamo solo questo.

translation.en: The song isn't released until after he dies.
translation.it: Fu pubblicata solo dopo la sua morte.

translation.en: "Change is Gonna Come" is the perfect ending
translation.it: "Change is Gonna Come" è il finale perfetto

translation.en: for a career that was way too short... for a life that was way too truncated.
translation.it: di una carriera fin troppo breve... ...di una vita interrotta troppo presto.

translation.en: It was a long time coming in 1964,
translation.it: C'è voluto molto tempo fino al 1964,

translation.en: and it is the shame of this nation...
translation.it: ed è la vergogna di questo Paese...

translation.en: that that song should still be so relevant.
translation.it: ...che questa canzone sia ancora così importante.

translation.en: The activism is one thing, but the music is powerful.
translation.it: L'attivismo è una cosa, ma la musica è potente.

translation.en: "Change is Gonna Come" communicates the rent of black life in America,
translation.it: "A Change is Gonna Come" mostra il prezzo della vita di un nero in America,

translation.en: and Sam Cooke taps into that with such poetry.
translation.it: e Sam Cooke lo sfrutta con così tanta poesia.

translation.en: ♪ There've been times that I thought ♪
translation.it: Ci sono momenti in cui ho pensato

translation.en: ♪ I couldn't last-- ♪
translation.it: Di non poter resistere a lungo...

translation.en: It's meant to touch the soul, you see. That's what this song is about.
translation.it: Serve a mettere alla prova l'anima, di questo si tratta.

translation.en: ♪ Now I think I'm able ♪
translation.it: Ora penso di poter

translation.en: ♪ To carry on ♪
translation.it: Andare avanti

translation.en: ♪ It's been a... .♪
translation.it: È passato...

translation.en: It's his eulogy, the greatest gift he could've given us.
translation.it: È la sua elegia, il dono più grande che ci potesse fare.

translation.en: ♪ A long time comin' ♪ ♪ But I know ♪
translation.it: molto tempo, ma so

translation.en: -♪ A change gonna come ♪ -♪Change gonna come ♪
translation.it: Che le cose cambieranno

translation.en: [both] ♪ Oh, yes, it will ♪
translation.it: Oh, sì, cambieranno.

translation.en: Yes, it will.
translation.it: Sì, cambieranno.

translation.en: [man] All I can say to you, darling, is Sam Cooke's yours.
translation.it: Posso solo dirti, tesoro, che Sam Cooke è tuo.

translation.en: He'll never grow old. Sam, it's been nice.
translation.it: Non passerà mai di moda. Sam, è stato bello.

translation.en: -It's been wonderful. -Thank you.
translation.it: - È stato fantastico. - Grazie, Sam.

translation.en: You're welcome.
